title: The G2P Framework™
subtitle: PhD-backed, research-driven methodology for service companies delivering measurable operational maturity
whatIsDescription: G2P bridges strategy and execution by making governance measurable. Unlike manufacturing-focused methodologies (Lean, Six Sigma), G2P is built for service businesses where knowledge work, decision-making, and autonomy drive performance.
tenet2: Autonomy must be earned, not granted
tenet3: Decisions improve when cognitive load is managed
tenet5: Resilience comes from automation + human oversight

stage1.title: Diagnose
stage1.desc: Assess current maturity across all 5 indices

stage4.title: Measure
stage4.desc: Track indices on PraXio™ dashboards monthly

readyDescription: Start with a free Operational Health Diagnostic to see your G2P indices
